dialogue.speaker: MANDELLA
dialogue.text: You went to the party?  I thought we were officially opposed to suburban social activity.

dialogue.speaker: MANDELLA
dialogue.text: You didn't have a choice?  Where's Kat and what have you done with her?

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: I did Bianca a favor and it backfired.

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: I got drunk.  I puked.  I got rejected. It was big fun.
